mapper.sql: id, waybill_no, products_mark, weight, correct_weight, pmxzx_mark, bwd_mark, material_type
waybill_no, products_mark, weight, correct_weight, pmxzx_mark, bwd_mark, material_type
mapper.update:
update bms_marking_products
waybill_no = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
products_mark = #{productsMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
correct_weight = #{correctWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pmxzx_mark = #{pmxzxMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bwd_mark = #{bwdMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
material_type = #{materialType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select m.weight,m.correct_weight,b.outstock_no, b.external_no, m.waybill_no, b.fees_no, b.waybill_num, b.warehouse_code, b.warehouse_name, b.customerid,b.customer_name,b.shop_name,b.carrier_id,b.carrier_name, b.deliverid,b.deliver_name from bms_marking_products m INNER JOIN biz_dispatch_bill b on m.waybill_no=b.waybill_no and b.del_flag=0 WHERE 1=1 and m.products_mark=#{productsMark} and m.weight=#{weight}
